verses.name: John 1:1
verses.text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

verses.name: John 1:2
verses.text: The same was in the beginning with God.

verses.name: John 1:3
verses.text: All things were made by him; and without him was not any thing made that was made.

verses.name: John 1:4
verses.text: In him was life; and the life was the light of men.

verses.name: John 1:5
verses.text: And the light shineth in darkness; and the darkness comprehended it not.

verses.name: John 1:6
verses.text: There was a man sent from God, whose name was John.

verses.name: John 1:7
verses.text: The same came for a witness, to bear witness of the Light, that all men through him might believe.
